txt.en: 'There is much to do in the Vales, my friend.'
'You have done much to aid my efforts.'
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should talk to Radagast.
Chicken nests can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should collect chicken eggs from nests in Rhosgobel.
Place the eggs in the warming chest outside Radagast's cottage

'It would seem the hens that roost in Rhosgobel are quite content with their home, now that Laerlad has become still once again. Now I have a new problem. I seem to be acquiring too many eggs. Would you gather up today's eggs and put them in the warming chest inside my cottage?'
A warming chest can be found just outside Radagast's cottage in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should place the eggs that you have collected in the warming chest.
The hens that roost in Rhosgobel are constantly laying eggs.
'These will do well in my errands around the Vales. The Woodmen are always fond of the eggs I bring as gifts when visiting them.'
